Title: 7 Letters
Director: Junfeng Boo, Eric Khoo, Jack Neo, K Rajagopal, Pin Pin Tan, Royston Tan, Kelvin Tong
Writer: Junfeng Boo, Ivan Ho, Eric Khoo, Jack Neo, K Rajagopal, Pin Pin Tan, Royston Tan, Kelvin Tong
Actors: Faizal Abdullah, Aric Hidir Amin, Fatin Amira, Juliette Binoche
Plot: An emotive anthology by seven of Singapore's most illustrious filmmakers, celebrating SG50 through the lives and stories of Singaporeans. Directed by Eric Khoo, Jack Neo, K. Rajagopal, Royston Tan, Tan Pin Pin, Boo Junfeng, Kelvin Tong.
